Name: Palomino Flor
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of short pale yellow stalk and leaf from celery heart.
Review: Celery imparts subtle vegetal notes in this unusual aperitivo cocktail.
History: Jody Monteith at The Liquorists, Manchester, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Palomino Flor contains 181 calories
